mapper.sql: Dict_id, Dict_number, Dict_value, Dict_createtime, Dict_modifytime, Dict_delete, Dict_type, Dict_status
mapper.select:
select
from rb_dict where Dict_type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND Dict_delete = 0 ORDER BY Dict_number ASC
select Dict_value from rb_dict where Dict_status = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND Dict_delete = 0
select Dict_value from rb_dict where Dict_status = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND Dict_delete = 0
select Dict_type from rb_dict where Dict_status = 19 AND Dict_delete = 0
mapper.insert: insert into rb_dict (Dict_id, Dict_number, Dict_value, Dict_createtime, Dict_modifytime, Dict_delete, Dict_type, Dict_status) values (#{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dictNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT }, #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dictModifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dictDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{dictStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update rb_dict
Dict_value = #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Dict_number = #{dictNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Dict_createtime = #{dictCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Dict_modifytime = #{dictModifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Dict_delete = #{dictDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},

Dict_status = #{dictstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rb_dict set Dict_value = #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Dict_number = #{dictNumber.jdbcType=BIGINT}, Dict_createtime = #{dictCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Dict_modifytime = #{dictModifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Dict_delete = #{dictDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Dict_type = #{dictType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Dict_status = #{dictstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
